title: Reality bites : sex, STDs and contraception
creator_credit: Liolja Davis and Video Education Australasia
brief_description: This program explores sexuality issues for young people, highlighting sexual identity, sexual diversity, relationships and communication, sexually transmitted diseases and contraception. Understanding sex and sexuality is a key component addressed in the program, as is decision making, being sexually active, practicing safe sex, and dealing with unwanted pregnancies.
